resources.string: Tap here to agree to the new Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy.
Switching to this phone will turn off Call & text on other devices on %s.
"Use this phone's number to make and receive calls and texts on your other Samsung devices."
Make and receive calls and texts on this tablet.
Connect your watch to your phone and try again.
To use %s, you need to change your default messaging app to Samsung Messages.
To use %s, you need to change your default calling app to Samsung Phone.
To use %s, you need to change your default calling app to Samsung Phone and your default messaging app to Samsung Messages.
Default messaging app changed. Your linked Galaxy devices may not be able to send messages anymore.
"Default messaging app changed. This tablet may not be able to send messages through the phone it's linked to anymore."
"%s turned off because it isn't supported by the default calling and messaging apps."
Default calling app changed. Your linked Galaxy devices may not be able to make calls anymore.
"Default calling app changed. This tablet may not be able to make calls through the phone it's linked to anymore."
Item at position %d cannot be dragged.
"This routine couldn't perform this action because Airplane mode was on."
"This routine couldn't perform this action because you're using this tablet as a guest."
"This routine couldn't perform this action because Mobile data and Wi-Fi were turned off."
"This routine couldn't perform this action because there was no SIM card inserted when the routine ran."
"This routine couldn't perform this action because Wi-Fi was turned off."
"This routine couldn't perform this action because Call & text on other device wasn't set up when the routine ran."
Scan the QR code with the Galaxy phone you want to connect your tablet to.
"After that, you'll be able to call and text from your tablet as long as it's signed in to the same Samsung account as your phone."
To set up Call & text on other devices on your tablet, watch, or speaker:
To be able to call and text from your tablet:
Make sure all the devices you want to call and text with are signed in to the same Samsung account.
To get all your contacts on all your devices, go to More options and select Move contacts to Samsung account. Then, sync them so they stay up to date everywhere.
For tablets, turn on %s in Settings > Advanced features.
For watches, turn on Remote connection in Galaxy Wearable > Account and backup.
On your phone, go to Settings > Advanced features and turn on %s.
For speakers, turn on Voice messaging in Settings > %s.
Install the Galaxy Wearable app and try again.
Link this tablet to your phone
"To link this tablet to your phone, scan the QR code below with your phone's camera."
"You won't be able to make emergency calls from this phone."
"You won't be able to contact emergency services from this tablet while using %s."
"Can't register more than %1$d devices. On your phone, go to Settings > Advanced features > %2$s, remove a device, then try again."
Calls may have delays or other issues over slow mobile networks.
"Move your contacts to your Samsung account so they're available on all your devices."
Tap here to turn on %1$s and connect this device to %2$s.
Tap here to turn on %s and connect this tablet to your phone.
"%s is connected and can call and send messages using this phone's mobile connection."
"This device won't be able to make calls or send messages using your phone's mobile network."
"This device won't be able to make calls or send messages using your tablet's mobile network."
"You're roaming, so we turned off Use mobile data to keep you from using up your roaming data. Tap here to turn it back on."
Set up Call & text on other devices first.
Open Call & text on other devices
"Use this phone's number to make calls, send texts, and more from your Galaxy watch, tablet, or speaker."
Call and text on this tablet by connecting it to your phone.
Turning off Call & text on other devices…
Turning on Call & text on other devices…
You made %s your preferred SIM for mobile data, so we turned on Use mobile data to match your previous settings. Tap here to turn it off.
"You'll need to connect this phone to Wi-Fi to call and text from your other devices."
Select which SIM card to use for %s.
Switch to your other Samsung account?
Turn on Sync contacts to make sure any contacts you add on other devices get synced to this one.
This will make sure any contacts you add on other devices get synced to this one.
Tap here to open the Galaxy Wearable app.
"Use this phone's number to make calls, send texts, and more from your Galaxy watch, tablet, or speaker."
Call and text on this tablet by connecting it to your phone.

To provide you this service, and in accordance with our Privacy Notice, we may collect information regarding: callers/message senders and recipients, contents of messages you send and receive, your contacts, your call and message history, your usage information, and other types of personal information. By continuing, you agree to our %1$sPrivacy Notice%2$s.
Check our %1$sPrivacy Notice%2$s to see how we manage your data.
To continue, agree to the %1$sPrivacy Notice%2$s.
By continuing, you agree to our %1$sPrivacy Notice%2$s.
To link your tablet to your phone, both devices need to be signed in to the same Samsung account.
"For service when Wi-Fi isn't available, select %s as your preferred SIM for mobile data."
To make calls and send text messages from this device, turn on Call and message continuity in Settings.
"Can't check for updates. Your phone isn't connected to a network."
"Can't check for updates. Your tablet isn't connected to a network."
"Connect to your other devices over mobile networks when Wi-Fi isn't available."
The latest version is already installed.
